antlr
Class RuleBlock

java.lang.Object
  antlr.GrammarElement
      antlr.AlternativeElement
          antlr.AlternativeBlock
              antlr.RuleBlock
public class RuleBlock
extends antlr.AlternativeBlock

A list of alternatives and info contained in the rule definition.
